description:
Get to the bike park or velodrome quickly and smoothly. Equipped with Thule’s AcuTight™ torque-limiting quick-release skewer, loading is quick and carbon-friendly. This fork-mounted rack has a sleek aerodynamic profile for a quiet, efficient ride.

  • Compatible with 9mm axle disc brake and suspension combinations (Thru-axle adapters separately available), wheelbases up to 50in. and tires up to 3in
  • Tool-free universal mounting
  • Fits aero profile, square bar and most factory racks
  • AcuTight limiter click when optimal torque is reached, protecting carbon forks
  • High-wall wheel cradle provides protection and a secure fit
  • D-shaped, low profile, corrosion resistant, aluminum tray provides significant strength and longevity
  • Padded ratcheting wheel strap for quick attachment
  • Internal cable lock is long enough to weave through the frame
  • Locks to your roof rack
  • Easily switches to either side of the car
  • Max load is 18kg
name: Thule FastRide Fork-Mount Bike Rack
